cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 3 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: These room sleep 4 guests,  with single beds some with loft beds .All beds have fresh linen and towels, plus your own personal safe . Free WIFI .Ceiling fan  and split air conditioners, additional extra extra in summer months for $1 for 8 hours.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.labelDescription: These rooms sleep 3 guests and  have 3 beds, some with loft beds .All beds have fresh linen and towels, plus your own personal safe .Free Wifi. Ceiling fan and split air conditioners, additional extra extra in summer months for $1 for 8 hours.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: This room sleeps 1 guest with a single bed in a private room. All fresh linen with towel plus a television, fridge with a complementary bottle of water , bed side table with lamps. Free Wifi Ceiling Fan and split air conditioner .

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 12th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 12th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
